text: Anata gata shinkō suru mono yo, ware no tekideari, mata anata gata no tekidearu mono o, tomo to shite wa naranai. Anata gata ni atae rareta shinri o kyohi shite iru ni mo kakawarazu, mitsu ni kōi o yoseru no ka. Kare-ra wa, anata gata no shu, arrā o shinkō shite iru to iu riyū de, shito to anata gata o tsuihō shita nodearu. Anata gata wa, ware no yorokobi o negainagara, ware no tame ni seisen ni dekakete inagara,(ippō de) kare-ra ni kōi o yoseru no ka. Ware wa anata gata no kakusu koto mo, gen wasu koto mo shitte iru. Anata gata no naka ko no yōna koto o suru mono wa, hontōni tadashī michi kara mayoi satta monodearu
